originalText:
::Welcome to *Hopperdrome*, the place for all your hopper racing needs!

*Third South Underrail Hop-off - final day events*:
        - Pentapus Tom's scrap juggling act
        - Brew drinking contest
        - *Hop-off Final - 10-lap race*
        - Musical program: The Traveling Septaphonists, Metal Fatigue, 10011001
*Hoppers*:
        $(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper1info)
        ------------------------------------------------------------------
        $(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper2info)
        ------------------------------------------------------------------
        $(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper3info)
        ------------------------------------------------------------------
        $(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper4info)
        ------------------------------------------------------------------
*Wager types*:
        On the nose - back the hopper to finish first only
        At the tail - back the hopper to finish second only
        Slow show - back the hopper to finish third only
        In the coins - back the hopper to finish either first or second; first place means full payment, second place is reduced payment::

::*How does fixed-odds betting work*: Here at the Hopperdrome we use decimal odds. This type of odds takes into account that the bettor must first part with their part of the stake to make a bet. Therefore, the decimal odds of an outcome are equivalent to one plus the decimal value of the fractional odds.
Example: Betting at 1.01 odds means that for every 100 charons the bettor earns one charon, or 1% of the wager.

Below is a list of odds for each racing hopper, ordered by wager types (on the nose, at the tail, slow show and in the coins, respectively).

-------------------------------------------------
$(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper1quotas)
-------------------------------------------------
$(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper2quotas)
-------------------------------------------------
$(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper3quotas)
-------------------------------------------------
$(interfacing_xpbl_hopperRacing_hopper4quotas)
-------------------------------------------------::
